channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-16435] RpcMetrics should not be retained forever
item.description:
• RpcMetrics objects are registered into defaultmetricssystem
  • although there is a shutdown() call (which is actually invoked) it doesn't unregisters itself from the metricssystem
  • RpcDetailedMetrics has the same issue

background

  • hiveserver2 slowly eats up memory when running simple queries in new sessions (select 1)
  • every session opens a tezsession
  • tezsession has rpcmetrics
  • with a 150M heap after around 30 session the jvm gets outofmemmory
item.summary: RpcMetrics should not be retained forever

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

aajisaka I've uploaded some more info; including a full heapdump somewhere around the heap gets filled up
kgyrtkirk org.apache.hadoop.ipc.metrics.RpcMetrics#shutdown will be called when the server is stopped. so I wonder whether the solution is ok?
Jack-Lee yes, it will be unregistered when the server is stopped - if I don't fully understand your concern; could you be more specific?

This message was automatically generated.
kgyrtkirk I mean that the session is end is not identity that the server is end .

I don't think this is about a single session - these metrics are only used in the IPC Server.
If you create an server and then shut it down - would you expect its metrics to be retained? (IMHO: if it silently retaines any information related to the actual instance that's a resource leak)

kgyrtkirk thank you for the information.
+1, I confirmed there are 30+ RpcMetrics retained in the heap dump. Let's unregister this.

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #17007 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/17007/)
HADOOP-16435. RpcMetrics should not retained forever. Contributed by (aajisaka: rev cbfa3f3e988b8a3f142abadfe4f18201b6438ac9)

  • (add) hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/ipc/metrics/TestRpcMetrics.java
  • (edit) hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ipc/metrics/RpcMetrics.java
  • (edit) hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ipc/metrics/RpcDetailedMetrics.java

Committed this to trunk, branch-3.2, branch-3.1, branch-2, branch-2.9, and branch-2.8.
Thanks kgyrtkirk for the contribution and thanks Jack-Lee for the comments.
